item.title: Formal Notice sent to Assistant District Attorney Cullen Enabnit, Brooklyn District Attorney’s Office
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-04_1428_0800_email_to_cullen_enabnit_brooklyn_da_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 04, 2024, 14:28 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 04, 2024, 01:28 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-04_1428_0800_email_to_cullen_enabnit_brooklyn_da_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Enabnit, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code § 4, as well as relevant state statutes.
